Peñalver and Cabrera about our systematic review of rituximab in ITP. Our inclusion criteria for primary reports in the review had to be fairly liberal because most reports were case series or cohort studies, reflecting, perhaps surprisingly, the paucity of methodologically rigorous trials in this field. Nevertheless, we established a priori that care must be taken to avoid redundant publications, because many were published in abstract form only and some were follow-up reports of preliminary studies.The report by Peñalver and colleagues gave us reason to pause (1).
